AzureOpenAISettings.Endpoint: Azure OpenAI service endpoint e.g. https://xyz.openai.azure.com/>
AzureOpenAISettings.Key: Azure OpenAI service key e.g. xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
AzureOpenAISettings.DeploymentId: Azure OpenAI model deployment id e.g. gpt-4-32k
AzureOpenAISettings.ModelType: Azure OpenAI model type - should be gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo or gpt-35-turbo. Needed for token calculation.
